original_text: And let them judge the people at all seasons: and it shall be, that every great matter they shall bring unto thee, but every small matter they shall judge: so shall it be easier for thyself, and they shall bear the burden with thee.
korean_text: 그들이 때를 따라 백성을 재판하게 하라 큰 일은 모두 네게 가져갈 것이요 작은 일은 모두 그들이 스스로 재판할 것이니 그리하면 그들이 너와 함께 담당할 것인즉 일이 네게 쉬우리라

sentences.original_text: And let them judge the people at all seasons:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모든 때에 백성을 재판하게 하라

sentences.original_text: that every great matter they shall bring unto thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 큰 일은 그들이 네게 가져가겠고

sentences.original_text: but every small matter they shall judge:
so shall it be easier for thyself,
and they shall bear the burden with thee.
